txt.en:
While exploring Skoironk, you notice a number of veins of ore that look nothing like the ones you have come across in your previous adventures.

You take it upon yourself to collect samples of these ore so that they can be studied by scholars in Gondor.

<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Skoironk: Breeder of Poison to be underway. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter this instance in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
Bring the ore samples to Thurindol
You should collect ore samples and bring them to Thurindol.

While exploring Skoironk, you notice a number of veins of ore that look nothing like the ones you have come across in your previous adventures.

You take it upon yourself to collect samples of these ore so that they can be studied by scholars in Gondor.

<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Skoironk: Breeder of Poison to be underway. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter this instance in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
'This ore you have gathered is intriguing. I have not seen its like. Perhaps they will help us learn more of the tunnels beneath the hills and how they were built.'
Bring the ore samples to Thurindol
